caption:
Everyone knows the Big 🍎 as the city that never sleeps. Nowadays that’s all due to it’s influx of run clubs, which is why for Highsnobiety’s Not In New York takeover HOKA invited ROOTED, a local creative collective connecting South Asian creativity, community and culture founded by Reva Bhatt to lead a run across the concrete jungle’s most infamous spots and neighbourhoods, from the Meatpacking District to Hudson River and finishing with a sweet post-run brunch at The Standard Highline.

Check out what else went down at Highsnobiety.com. #FlyHumanFly #HOKA
